thread.section_title: Airyhair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airyhair | airyhair.com
thread.title: Emma_K

author: Emma_K
title: Emma_K
text:
I have no problem with any of the staff members, everyone is super nice and friendly.
Well last time i ordered some clips-ins hair and one of them was broken by my post-delivery guy who is thankfully now fired. Airyhair thankfully member replaced the hair for me quickly which is a huge plus and impressed me a lot. What a fantastic customer service.
The hair is lovely, my boyfriend and mom even asked me to try wearing even longer hair in bright colors so letâ€™s see how that goes.
I do think that invisible tape-ins nowadays work much better than clip-ins and i wonder when you will have thicker tape hair in 20pcs available as i can't wait to try out.
